オプション1: Vegetation grew thick, but Star Man had no idea which plants were edible.

On Poweregg Planet the sky was dark and reddish, because its star was near the end of its life and weak.
Plants grew leaning toward the star, and their leaves were black.
Poweregg Planet's axial tilt was large, so Prolitan Island was in perpetual evening or perpetual night.
Star Man tore off a leaf at random and put it in his mouth.
When he spat out the leaves from his mouth, something strange came into view.

A huge cube was sitting there.
It was green, about a meter on a side, and had a fresh, moist look.
(It doesn't feel like a rock... what is that...?)
As Star Man walked toward it, the cube whirled around.
The cube came toward him slowly, bouncing as it went.
Star Man froze on the spot from exhaustion.

Because of its bulk, the cube soon snagged on a tree and couldn't get through.
Even so, it kept pushing straight toward the obstacle; the tree began to crackle and topple.
(The way it keeps ramming the tree is like a robot...)
Star Man fled in a hurry.
